FuncDef: The display sfu isolate-switch command displays whether SFU isolation has been enabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To prevent pass loss and improve network quality when an SFU is swapped online, run the set sfu isolate-switch enable command to enable SFU isolation.
To check whether SFU isolation has been enabled, run the display sfu isolate-switch command. If SFU isolation has not been enabled, you can run the set sfu isolate-switch command to enable SFU isolation.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
